Terraform used the selected providers to generate the following execution plan. Resource actions are indicated with the following symbols:
  ~ update in-place

Terraform will perform the following actions:

  # aws_s3_bucket.documents will be updated in-place
  ~ resource "aws_s3_bucket" "documents" {
        arn                         = "arn:aws:s3:::company-documents-bucket"
        bucket                      = "company-documents-bucket"
        id                          = "company-documents-bucket"
        tags                        = {}
        tags_all                    = {}

      + lifecycle_rule {
          + abort_incomplete_multipart_upload_days = 7
          + enabled                                = true
          + id                                     = "document_lifecycle"
          + prefix                                 = "documents/"

          + expiration {
              + days = 2555
            }

          + noncurrent_version_expiration {
              + days = 90
            }

          + noncurrent_version_transition {
              + days          = 30
              + storage_class = "STANDARD_IA"
            }

          + noncurrent_version_transition {
              + days          = 60
              + storage_class = "GLACIER"
            }

          + transition {
              + days          = 30
              + storage_class = "STANDARD_IA"
            }

          + transition {
              + days          = 90
              + storage_class = "GLACIER"
            }

          + transition {
              + days          = 365
              + storage_class = "DEEP_ARCHIVE"
            }
        }

      + versioning {
          + enabled    = true
          + mfa_delete = false
        }
    }

  # aws_s3_bucket_server_side_encryption_configuration.documents will be created
  + resource "aws_s3_bucket_server_side_encryption_configuration" "documents" {
      + bucket = "company-documents-bucket"
      + id     = (known after apply)

      + rule {
          + apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
              + kms_master_key_id = "arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:123456789012:key/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012"
              + sse_algorithm     = "aws:kms"
            }

          + bucket_key_enabled = true
        }
    }

Plan: 1 to add, 1 to change, 0 to destroy.
